alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Southern Livingston; St. James; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 11:45PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF ASCENSION, ST. JAMES, SOUTH CENTRAL LIVINGSTON AND NORTHEASTERN ASSUMPTION PARISHES THROUGH 1215 AM CST... At 1145 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Gonzales to Sorrento to near Convent. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Gramercy, Lutcher, Sorrento, French Settlement, Convent, Whitehall, Belle Rose, North Vacherie, Wallace, and Garyville. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 175 and 197. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CST for southeastern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Southern Livingston; St. James; Western Ascension
